channel.title: Project Revolution 474
channel.description:
[center][size=24pt]UPDATED THREAD: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,595829.0.html[/size][/center]
[center][b]Welcome to the offical Project Revolution 474 BETA thread.[/b][/center] [center]Project Revolution is a Project Insanity based server.[/center]
Hey Moparian's, Let me introduce myself. My name is Christopher and I'm a fairly new member of this community, I'm 16 years old and I live in Australia. This is my first time posting a thread on these forums so please bare with me. I'm new to coding and I hate following tutorials, I like to do things myself and make them the best way possible.
Features In Release: 1.
[ul][li]Removed all possible dupes.[/li] [li]Rare drop spam when running the server has been removed.[/li] [li]Fixed deadlocks.[/li] [li]Redone commands.java.[/li] [li]Fixed PM issues.[/li] [li]Improved a few methods.[/li] [li]Fixed 2 ranged with 99 magic and 9 combat level glitch.[/li] [li]Fixed all the 800 warnings eclipse gives you.[/li] [li]Fixed ClanChat.[/li] [li]Redone Jad. (1 Wave)[/li] [li]No need to log out when you enter Fight Caves.[/li] [li]Fixed God Wars npc's.[/li] [li]Redone shops.[/li] [li]Removed Giles at home.[/li] [li]Added alters at home.[/li] [li]Fixed Lunar magic book freezing.[/li] [li]Fixed veng spell.[/li] [li]Cleaned out quest tab.[/li] [li]Added ::Commands[/li] [li]Added ::Rules[/li] [li]Added ::MB (Mage Bank Tele)[/li] [li]Redone Barrows.java[/li] [li]New crowns.[/li] [li]Removed all of Sanity's exploits.[/li] [li]Redone Shops (Eco Friendly).[/li][/ul]
Pictures: [img]http://i.cubeupload.com/6R68dx.png[/img] I put the source and client in a clean hard drive and scanned that with Malwarebytes. MBAM dosen't support single file scans + some of the picture got cut off :( [img]http://i.cubeupload.com/s2nR1B.png[/img] [img]http://i.cubeupload.com/PB5Hvs.png[/img] [img]http://i.cubeupload.com/Eo04Jz.png[/img] [img]http://i.cubeupload.com/qljfsR.png[/img] [img]http://i.cubeupload.com/VLETdM.png[/img] [img]http://i.cubeupload.com/Jt2uLS.png[/img] [img]http://i.cubeupload.com/EcY6Bb.png[/img] [img]http://i.cubeupload.com/UCtmC1.png[/img] [img]http://i.cubeupload.com/J8LTxu.png[/img] [img]http://i.cubeupload.com/3w82hD.png[/img] [img]http://i.cubeupload.com/Kk1noD.png[/img] [img]http://i.cubeupload.com/kCKaWg.png[/img] [img]http://i.cubeupload.com/Efx0pA.png[/img] [img]http://i.cubeupload.com/RNJ8qT.png[/img]
Credits: Sanity. Me.
Please no flame this is my first release.
//End of version: 1
[center][b]Welcome to the offical Project Revolution 474 thread.[/b][/center] [center]Project Revolution is a Project Insanity based server.[/center]
Whats comming in Version 2?
[ul][li]Redone CombatAssistant.java (Progress: 100%)[/li] [li]Redone FightCaves.java again, Much more clean now. (Progress 100%)[/li] [li]Also expect some more cool features and fixes to be released in version 2.[/li][/ul]
Picture Preview (Taken On The Public Pre-Beta Server): [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/SKb79.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/AgmPH.png[/img]
___________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[size=36pt]Due to upgrading to Windows 8 I had some Java difficulties. These have been fixed and I'v done mass coding/edits/fixes to this source. The FINAL release of this open source/client will most likely be during late February to early August. For now enjoy testing/decompiling the Beta releases of this source/client.
Scroll down for BETA FINAL![/size] http://www.mirrorfile.com/4ywflk2gm429

[center][size=24pt]UPDATED THREAD: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,595829.0.html[/size][/center]

[center]Welcome to the offical Project Revolution 474 BETA thread.[/center]
[center]Project Revolution is a Project Insanity based server.[/center]

Hey Moparian’s, Let me introduce myself. My name is Christopher and I’m a fairly new member of this community, I’m 16 years old and I live in Australia. This is my first time posting a thread on these forums so please bare with me. I’m new to coding and I hate following tutorials, I like to do things myself and make them the best way possible.

Features In Release: 1.

[ul][li]Removed all possible dupes.[/li]
[li]Rare drop spam when running the server has been removed.[/li]
[li]Fixed deadlocks.[/li]
[li]Redone commands.java.[/li]
[li]Fixed PM issues.[/li]
[li]Improved a few methods.[/li]
[li]Fixed 2 ranged with 99 magic and 9 combat level glitch.[/li]
[li]Fixed all the 800 warnings eclipse gives you.[/li]
[li]Fixed ClanChat.[/li]
[li]Redone Jad. (1 Wave)[/li]
[li]No need to log out when you enter Fight Caves.[/li]
[li]Fixed God Wars npc’s.[/li]
[li]Redone shops.[/li]
[li]Removed Giles at home.[/li]
[li]Added alters at home.[/li]
[li]Fixed Lunar magic book freezing.[/li]
[li]Fixed veng spell.[/li]
[li]Cleaned out quest tab.[/li]
[li]Added ::Commands[/li]
[li]Added ::Rules[/li]
[li]Added ::MB (Mage Bank Tele)[/li]
[li]Redone Barrows.java[/li]
[li]New crowns.[/li]
[li]Removed all of Sanity’s exploits.[/li]
[li]Redone Shops (Eco Friendly).[/li][/ul]

Pictures:

6R68dx.png710×352

I put the source and client in a clean hard drive and scanned that with Malwarebytes. MBAM dosen’t support single file scans + some of the picture got cut off
s2nR1B.png1304×470

PB5Hvs.png757×498

Eo04Jz.png760×501

qljfsR.png760×499

VLETdM.png724×449









Credits:
Sanity.
Me.

Please no flame this is my first release.

//End of version: 1

[center]Project Revolution is a Project Insanity based server.[/center]

Whats comming in Version 2?

[ul][li]Redone CombatAssistant.java (Progress: 100%)[/li]
[li]Redone FightCaves.java again, Much more clean now. (Progress 100%)[/li]
[li]Also expect some more cool features and fixes to be released in version 2.[/li][/ul]

Picture Preview (Taken On The Public Pre-Beta Server):

SKb79.png765×502

[size=36pt]Due to upgrading to Windows 8 I had some Java difficulties. These have been fixed and I’v done mass coding/edits/fixes to this source. The FINAL release of this open source/client will most likely be during late February to early August. For now enjoy testing/decompiling the Beta releases of this source/client.
